pages.text: $(li)The Unbreaking enchantment can be applied in any kind of Helmet, Chestplate, Leggins, Boots, $(l:patchouli:weapons/shield)Shields$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_pickaxe)Pickaxe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_axe)Axe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/wooden_sword)Sword$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_hoe)Hoe$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/wooden_shovel)Shovel$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/bow)Bow$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/crossbow)Crossbow$(/l), $(l:patchouli:weapons/trident)Trident$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/fishing_rod)Fishing Rod$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l), $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/flamarang)Flamarang$(/l), $(l:patchouli:armors/elytra)$(l:patchouli:weapon/crossbow)$(l:patchouli:weapons/crossbow)Crossbow$(/l)$(/l)$(/l)s or any kind of item that have an specific durability.
pages.title: Unbreaking

pages.text: $(li)This enchantment reduces the lose of durability of the enchanted armor or tool.$(br)$(li)By default, it can be upgrade just until level III.$(br)$(li)You can raise the level IV of this enchantment using an $(l:patchouli:enchanting/quark/ancient_tome_unbreaking)Ancient Tome (Unbreaking)$(/l).
